data.title: Who among the following is the recipient of the Dadasaheb Phalke Award, 2016?
data.text:
The Dadasaheb Phalke Award is the highest honor in Indian cinema, presented by the Government of India. It is given to individuals who have made outstanding contributions to the film industry. In this question, the recipient of the Dadasaheb Phalke Award in 2016 is being asked.

Option 1: Nana Patekar. Nana Patekar is a renowned actor in Indian cinema, known for his powerful performances. However, he is not the recipient of the Dadasaheb Phalke Award in 2016.

Option 2: Manoj Kumar. Manoj Kumar is an acclaimed actor and filmmaker, known for his patriotic films. However, he is not the recipient of the Dadasaheb Phalke Award in 2016.

Option 3: Javed Akhtar. Javed Akhtar is a well-known writer, poet, and lyricist in the Indian film industry. He has contributed significantly to Hindi cinema. However, he is not the recipient of the Dadasaheb Phalke Award in 2016.

Option 4: K. Viswanath. K. Viswanath, a prominent filmmaker in the Telugu film industry, is the correct answer.
